Reviews.Title: Excelent laptop
Reviews.Author: Augusto La Cruz
Reviews.Content: This Toshiba Satellite laptop is an excelent product. I'm very happy with it because is a very fast and practical machine.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite L855-S5244 15.6-Inch Laptop (Mercury Silver)
Reviews.Author: Merle Dennis
Reviews.Content: Great specifications for the price.  I bought it for my nephew and he is very pleased.  We will be ordering another one,

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: James D. Davidson
Reviews.Content: Very Happy, much better than the 6 year old Toshiba that finally died. I especially like the number keypad on the right side rather than hunt and peck on the top line. Feel of the keys are better. All in all , HAPPY!

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael Costanten
Reviews.Content: The computer works very well. Ten key pad is great to have. The mouse has a great feel. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: toshiba quality issue hard drive
Reviews.Author: Mom Donna
Reviews.Content: Although i have a different model I purchased a toshiba satellite lap top 1 1/2 years ago.  Hard drive is already failing with very little use of laptop and not much movement. Supposedly is a toshiba hard drive and write ups on tech sites are not kind. Toshiba's attitude, as usual, is tough, out of warranty (and all I asked for was the disk not a replacement).  1 1/2 years is pretty pathetic. Buyer beware. Go to the Toshiba repair web site (their own!!) to see all of the complaints.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba-Horrible Customer Service And Horrible Preformance
Reviews.Author: Robert Pellet
Reviews.Content: I bought a Toshiba Satellite C-655 in March and it is the worst laptop I have ever owned. From day 1 it crashed(Blue Screen) regularly. After finally contacting Toshiba after my hard drive would no longer work I sent it back for repair.I spent a long time with their representative describing my problems. I stressed in no uncertain terms that the major issue was crashing.(blue screen). I returned it for service and when I got it back the repair ticket said computer would not boot up-replaced hard drive.I turned the machine on and in 90 seconds the laptop crashed,yes blue screen again. They completely ignored my original complaint ,installed a new hard drive ,saw it booted up and sent it back.Worst customer service I have ever encountered. It is going back to Toshiba but based on the reviews I read I have resigned myself to purchasing another model. Guess witch brand I will be avoiding. I now make a point of when I am in a store that sells computers of going to talk to the sales people and telling them of my Toshiba experience!

Reviews.Title: The Toshiba satellite was damaged
Reviews.Author: Martha Benavente
Reviews.Content: I had a bad experience with the Toshiba satellite L855-S5244 because the laptop screen is damaged. I would like to send it photos of this product but this route don't let me. What can I do to reclaim for this product?

Reviews.Title: Just awesome
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This Laptop is beautiful. Edges and corners are very smoooth. One of the best Toshiba designs.Package arrived ridiculously fast paying some few more bucks for ship. Came with original box with everything included in it.Regarding to the performance, it is very powerfull indeed. Good job from Toshiba.Maybe hard disk could be larger, but if you use an external drive, you'll have no issue then.

Reviews.Title: 15.6" laptop.
Reviews.Author: 808TREX50
Reviews.Content: The features is great. Ease of typing on chicklet keys is good. Power Saver plan saves battery power until the public library closes giving me 7 hrs 30 mins of productivity on laptop. Surfing on Chrome browser is a snap. It*s fast and easy. Touchpad should be centerally located in the left corner of laptop. My thumbs would accidently hit pad instead of spacebar thus moving the cursor elsewhere. Installed a wireless mouse...problem solved. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my aunt (she really wanted a computer, but i convinced her a laptop was better for her needs) and she absolutely loves it. Its not too heavy, the screen is HUGE and the webcam is really clear. Its also really fast (probably because she hasn't put anything on it yet) and I got it for under $500 on here. I went through the computer before i gave it to her, and everything felt comfortable (the keyboard and the mouse pad). I definitely recommend this to everyone - Toshiba's a great brand anyway.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba - Horrible Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Hande "Hande"
Reviews.Content: I have a three years old Toshiba Satellite L505. About 6 months ago the battery died so I replaced it. About a month ago, I lost sound - completely.I called their customer support and a kind representative told me I had a virus and it was manipulating my computer (he looked like he knew what he was talking about - he had no doubt so I trusted him). Since my warranty had expired, they asked me to pay $50 and than they told me to get a back up for everything I had because my laptop had to be reset again. I paid the $ 50 and bought external harddrive, copied everything to it and called their customer support again. They walked me through for setting up my computer again which is they get rid of everything and bring it back to when you first bought it.I did evrything as told. Next day, I turned on my computer and I still had no sound. So I called them again and they said " PROBABLY IT WAS NOT A VIRUS BUT THE SPEAKERS WERE NOT WORKING". So they were wrong and they made me do all those unnecessarily. Okay, mistaked happen, they are human but here is the part that makes me really upset and makes them a really horrible customer service. They said they will not be returning my money as their service is just diagnostic! I could not beleive what I heard because first of all they could not diagnose it correctly - it is still not diagnosed. Second of all diagnostic means determining the causes of problems but they walked me through deleting everything in my computer because of their wrong diagnose. They take no responsibility. I tried to find a email address to inform them of what happened to me and they have none!My Toshiba was one of those diaposable laptops, for two years it was fine but after that it started failing. And the Toshiba Customer service is not a good customer service. Just try to pay more and get a better computer, I think companies like this try to make us accept that the life of these things are short and so we keep buying new ones. They ruining our budgets and even worse the earth. Please think twice before you buy their junk as I regret it,  just pay a little more, buy a better brand that can be used for a long time with a decent customer service. It will better for your budget and your nerves in the long run.

Reviews.Title: beware of toshiba
Reviews.Author: Rhae "Rhae"
Reviews.Content: BEWARE OF TOSHIBA!  I purchased one of the satellite laptops in Nov 2011.  I had it only a few months when I got the dreaded BLUE SCREEN OF DEATH...When I mention to computer friends, they only shook their heads and gave me the look... You know the look, sympathy, don't get used to your new laptop, you will not have it that long...Boy were they ever right...I returned for repair and when I finally got back it worked... for a few weeks.  Then there it was again.. the BLUE SCREEN OF DEATH!  Once again, I returned for repair....This time I got it back and it has worked for a few months... until now... It happened again... I called Toshiba and I asked what they are going to do about it... "send it back for repair" again.. they have had two trys to fix and still they can not fix...Save your money and aggravation and buy another brand... Toshiba does not stand by their products...

Reviews.Title: wow it dont work
Reviews.Author: Joseph G. Wood
Reviews.Content: sent this l855 laptop to my mother 75 years old 1100 mi away she used it for 2days and the mouse pad locked up. did the fn-f9 still no luck , try to  steer a 75 year old through installing new drivers , it was a early Christmas present but looks bad right now . she dont know how to send it back nor will she try thanks toshiba

Reviews.Title: No llego la Factura
Reviews.Author: Angel Gomez
Reviews.Content: Hola Amigo Buenas tardes me gustaría saber si me enviaron junto al paquete la factura de la laptop ya queen mi Currier me dicen lo contrario
